regen.absent_element: reporting errors to users or systems
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the relevant users or systems of any detected errors during data integrity checks.
The system shall perform recovery of data after a disaster or system failure to ensure data integrity is maintained.

regen.absent_element: explicit specification for disaster data recovery
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide procedures for data recovery following a disaster event, ensuring all data can be accurately restored to meet statutory obligations.

label: disaster recovery capabilities including data recovery
